conversations.body_text: Hi Ryan Kojima,  ​I found out that your package was shipped on the 14th and has now arrived at the U.S. service station.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224806512

Thanks for your help.
 I'm looking forward to receive the product.

Thank you,
Ryan
________________________________
